DOC.brief_title: Phase 1 Study Compare Safety , Pharmacokinetic Profiles CJ-30056 Lipitor 20mg/Glucophage SR 750mg
DOC.detailed_description: To evaluate bioequivalence CJ-30056 co-administration atorvastatin 20mg metformin SR 750mg
DOC.criteria: 1 . Willing adhere protocol requirement sign inform consent form 2 . Male volunteer age 19 55 year old weight range exceed Â±20 % ideal weight 3 . Subjects history significant chronic disease 4 . Judged good health basis vital sign , ECG , physical exam routine laboratory data 1 . Use barbital inducer inhibitor medication within 28 day dose 2 . Symptom acute illness within 28 day prior drug administration 3 . History clinically significant hepatic , renal , gastrointestinal disease might significantly interfere ADME 4 . History surgery except gastrointestinal disease might significantly change absorption medicine 5 . History clinically significant allergy include drug allergy 6 . History clinically significant allergy atorvastatin metformin 7 . Subjects ever plan intravenous injection contrast medium ( intravenous urography , intravenous cholangiography , compute tomography use contrast medium ) within 28 day prior drug administration 8 . History myopathy 9 . Subjects genetic problem ( galactose intolerance , Lapp lactase deficiency , glucosegalactase malabsorption etc . ) 10 . Clinical laboratory test value outside accept normal range AST ALT > 1.25 time normal range Total bilirubin > 1.5 time normal range eGFR < 90 mL/min 11 . History drug , caffein ( caffein > 400mg/day ) , smoke ( cigarette > 10/day ) alcohol abuse ( alcohol > 30 g/day ) Subjects ever drink within 7 day prior drug administration 12 . Special diet know interfere absorption , distribution , metabolism excretion drug ( especially , consumption grapefruit juice ) within 7 day prior drug administration 13 . Donated blood within 60 day prior dose 14 . Participated previous clinical trial within 60 day prior dose 15 . Use medication , include herbal product , within 10 day dose 16 .
